sentences.sentence: The examples we will look at have quite different emphases.
sentences.translation: 我们将要观察的例子所强调的重点很不相同。

sentences.sentence: These three tracks must be mixed and balanced so as to produce the necessary emphases which in turn create desired effects.
sentences.translation: 为了创造重点并带来预期的效果，必须将这些音轨混合并做平衡。

sentences.sentence: Different emphases are useful to explain your relevance in differing environments.
sentences.translation: 不同的着重点对你解释你和不同的环境相关是很有用的。
